price: 55. Irrité de leur comportement, Nous tirâmes vengeance d’eux et les noyâmes tous autant qu’ils étaient.
arabic: فَلَمَّآ ءَاسَفُونَا ٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: falammā āsafūnā intaqamnā min'hum fa-aghraqnāhum ajmaʿīna
